lang.text: Yay! New version Available! Click to go to the releases.
Error: Select Input and Output Folder!
Error: Input Folder and Output Folder are the same!
Error: No Logs in Input Folder
Error: Wait until temp is cleared!
You can't open settings while rendering!
You can't open the "credits" menu while rendering!
Frames per Second of the final Video. Default: 60, Recommended: 30, 60, 120
Traillength sets the length of the Trail behind the Stick. Unit: Number of frames the trail goes back
Width determines the width of the final Video. The hight is automatically calculated with a ratio of 2:1
BorderThickness sets the width of a 'Shadow' surrounding the contours. Values: 0 to 100
BorderAngle sets the angle of the of the light source that casts the Shadow. Values: 0 to 360
BorderDistance sets distance from the sticks to the shadow. Values: 0 to 100
BorderBlur sets amount of blur applied on the shadow (increases render time a lot). Values: 0 to 100
BackgroundColor sets the color of the entire background. Values: #000000 to #FFFFFF
BackgroundOpacity sets the transparency of the Background. Values: 0 (100% transparent) to 100 (0% transparent)
SticksMode sets the sticks mode of the final Video. Values: 1 to 4
SticksModeVertPos sets the vertical position of the sticks mode information. The horizontal position is automatically determined and on the throttle stick. Values: 0 (top) to 100 (bottom)
StickColor sets the color of the sticks. Values: #000000 to #FFFFFF
SimultaneousRenderers sets the maximum number of simultaneous renderers.
